Name: Fencing Girl
About the game: This is a fencing competition game. According to the prompt of quick time event (QTE) on the screen, press the corresponding key to avoid the girl's attack and fight back. When you win the competition, you will get the favor of the girls. You can interact with the girl who likes you in the role scene. The girl will dance for you . Rewards: A total of 6 girls can be challenged. Whenever the girl's favor is improved through competition, more interactions can be unlocked. Such as lovely pose, and passionate dance.
Meta Title: Fencing Girl: Jan 12, 2022, SeaXY and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Fencing Girl? Check out the release date (Jan 12, 2022), developer insights from SeaXY, and a complete game summary.
